parameters.content:
Setup:
Create Google Sheet with a sheet named "Subscriptions" containing these columns:

name (or subscription_name)
vendor
amount
currency
billing_frequency (values: "Monthly" or "Annually")
last_payment_date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
next_payment_date (will be auto-calculated and updated)
expiry_date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
email (your email address for receiving summaries)
Configure Google Sheets Document ID:

Set the same Google Sheets Document ID in both "Read Subscriptions" and "Update Next Payment Dates" nodes
Configure Email:

Set your "From Email" address in the "Send Weekly Summary" node
